purpose: Facilitates user interaction with LangGraph agents through a chat interface, enhancing accessibility and usability
principle: Built on a web application framework using TypeScript and integrates with LangGraph for agent communication
reusability: Designed as a web app component, it can be integrated into existing web projects to enable chat-based interactions with LangGraph agents
limitations: Currently in alpha stage, may have limited features and stability; primarily supports interactions with LangGraph agents
name: agent-chat-ui

highlight: Interactive web-based chat interface for engaging with LangGraph agents using Python and TypeScript
